dictation.info: Test your listening and spelling with word dictations

left_p: Listen and write the word you hear. You can listen to the word as many times as you like.
You must spell the word correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.
Listen and write the word you hear. You can listen to the word as many times as you like.
You must spell the word correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.

dictation.info: Listen to full sentences and write the missing words

left_p: Listen to the full sentence and write the missing word in the space provided. You can listen to the sentence as many times as you like.
You must spell the word correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.

dictation.info: Test your listening and spelling with sentence dictations

left_p: Listen and write the sentence you hear. You can listen to the sentence as many times as you like.
You must spell everything correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.

words.textbox: The decision was made in my absence.||0px
His latest acquisition is a racehorse.||0px
We were advised to seek legal advice.||0px
The air became colder as we ascended.||0px
She balanced the cup on her knee.||0px
I believed his lies for years.||0px
The play was a brilliant success.||0px
He was careful to keep out of sight.||0px
The walls and ceiling were painted white.||0px
He chose banking as a career.||0px
The car slowly climbed the hill.||0px
Put a mark in the appropriate column.||0px
I definitely remember sending the letter.||0px
I was absolutely desperate to see her.||0px
The plane disappeared behind a cloud.||0px
She keeps good discipline in class.||0px
There seems no reason to doubt her story.||0px
He has a lot of enemies in the company.||0px
He equipped himself with a street plan.||0px
He tends to exaggerate the difficulties.||0px
We work every day except Sunday.||0px
The exhausted climbers were rescued by helicopter.||0px
I finally managed to get her attention.||0px
Supporters were forcibly removed from the court.||0px
We do not foresee any problems.||0px
The watch is still under guarantee.||0px
A guard was posted outside the building.||0px
She is the same height as her sister.||0px
I noticed a certain hesitancy in his voice.||0px
The thief used a false identity.||0px
She went to a lawyer for some independent advice.||0px
She sent the letter without my knowledge.||0px
It seemed a perfectly legitimate question.||0px
The house is large and difficult to maintain.||0px
She has two children by a previous marriage.||0px
Those children are always getting into mischief.||0px
He murmured something in his sleep.||0px
She tried to relax her tense muscles.||0px
The topic arose naturally in the conversation.||0px
Nowadays most kids prefer watching TV to reading.||0px
We may now look forward with optimism.||0px
She says the most outrageous things sometimes.||0px
The plane flew parallel to the coast.||0px
These documents are of particular interest.||0px
Radios are not permitted in the library.||0px
She persevered with her violin lessons.||0px
Some parents are too possessive of their children.||0px
It was a great privilege to hear her sing.||0px
She wishes to pursue a medical career.||0px
Send me all the relevant information.||0px
We had a meal in a restaurant.||0px
I managed to swim to safety.||0px
It was a really scary moment.||0px
He seized her by the arm.||0px
Several of the paintings were destroyed in the fire.||0px
You simply must see the play.||0px
Several people made speeches at the wedding.||0px
There are subtle differences between the two versions.||0px
They were successful in winning the contract.||0px
Allow sufficient time to get there.||0px
His arms were covered in tattoos.||0px
The article is full of technical terms.||0px
The children were arguing amongst themselves.||0px
He was determined to be thorough in his research.||0px
The bike is rusty but usable.||0px
We visited towns and villages all over Spain.||0px
He often plays the part of the villain.||0px
He led a life of virtue.||0px
They were at the door to welcome us.||0px
He seemed undecided whether to go or stay.||0px
The review is a brilliant piece of writing.||0px

left_p: Listen and write the sentence you hear. You can listen to the sentence as many times as you like.
You must spell everything correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.

dictation.info: A mixture of word and sentence dictations

left_p: Listen to the word or sentence, and write either the word, the missing word, or the full sentence that you hear. You can listen to the word or sentence as many times as you like.
You must spell everything correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.
Listen to the word or sentence, and write either the word or the part or full sentence that you hear. You can listen to the word or sentence as many times as you like.
You must spell everything correctly!
When you want to stop, select "Quit" to see your score in this session.
